name: DevOps Engineer
description:
Yakov & Partners is looking to hire DevOps Engineers (from Junior to Lead).

We are currently searching for a DevOps Engineer to work on an MLOps platform that will operationalize ML models in order to streamline business problem solving across a variety of industries.

You will design, maintain and develop legacy-free ML infrastructure, ensure uninterrupted operation of high-load services, design from scratch and develop processes to test and deploy the platform which will be available as both a SaaS and on-premise solution.

What we expect from you:

— 2+ years of experience.
— Solid Kubernetes ecosystem skills.
— Python experience.
— Experience using monitoring tools.
— Experience developing CI/CD processes (Gitlab CI).
— Experience working with Redis, KubeFlow, MLFlow, DVC, etcd.
— Experience developing MLOps processes.
— Linux administration skills.
— Great soft skills, team orientation.
— Readiness for hybrid work (Moscow).

What we offer:

— Unique experience at the intersection of technology and business in various industries.
— Performance bonuses.
— Fitness subsidies.
— Lunch allowance.
— Medical insurance covering a wide range of health clinics and services.
— Reimbursement of taxi fares.
— Massage, fresh fruits, meditation sessions, and workouts in the office.
— Corporate tennis club, squash, wakesurfing, and other activities.
